snippet: Cannes is awash in glamorous celebrities who peacock on the festival's red carpet and confidently parade through its multitudes....

headline.print_headline: Q&A: Baruchel Says He Lucked Out With 'Dragon'
headline.main: Q&A: Baruchel Says He Lucked Out With 'Dragon'

lead_paragraph: Cannes is awash in glamorous celebrities who peacock on the festival's red carpet and confidently parade through its multitudes.
